name: Crazy Cat Translator & Sounds
description:
Want to communicate with your cat? Hit record and translate your voice into meows! The Crazy Cat Translator also includes 16 different meows and a soundboard with 9 different sound effects! Download now and start meowing the crazy language of cats!


- Sounds & Meows:

The soundboard contains 16 crazy cat calls from sweet purring to angry cat fights! 9 more sounds include different kinds of meowing, dog sounds, bird sounds, mouse sounds, purring and even a lion sound. Your cat will go crazy for this app!

"5/5 Purrs!" - your cat


Disclaimer: This app is intended for entertainment purposes only.

Note: Cats often respond to the sounds produced by this app. If your pet displays signs of distress or aggression, discontinue use immediately.
